attributes.action: Close our borders and stop making British citizens second class
attributes.additional_details: All the scandal on rape gangs that have been covered up nothing done about it because they didn't no better if you live in our country respect the rules
attributes.background: There is to many people in this country it's come to the point when we're second class citizens in our own country if we say anything were racist enough is enough

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like taken.
